message:
Add a pixel density test, and fix pixel density implementations in PCX, DCX and ICO formats.



git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/imaging/trunk@1354661 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

added: bos.write4Bytes(pixelDensity == null ? 0 : (int)Math.round(pixelDensity.horizontalDensityMetres())); // x pixels per meter
bos.write4Bytes(pixelDensity == null ? 0 : (int)Math.round(pixelDensity.horizontalDensityMetres())); // y pixels per meter
